name: Mail Agent
description: Gmail integration via Composio. Read, send, search, and manage emails with full Gmail API capabilities.

credential_fields.name: gmail_connection_id
credential_fields.label: Gmail Connection ID
credential_fields.description: Your Gmail connection ID from Composio dashboard

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of emails to fetch (default: 10)

endpoints.description: Send a new email via Gmail with optional attachments and HTML formatting. Supports plain text, HTML emails, and file attachments.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Email body content (plain text or HTML)

parameters.name: is_html
parameters.description: Whether body is HTML formatted (default: false)

parameters.name: attachment_file_ids
parameters.description: Array of file IDs from file manager to attach

parameters.name: attachment_paths
parameters.description: Array of local file paths to attach

parameters.name: show_preview
parameters.description: Show email preview in canvas before sending (optional, for user confirmation)

endpoints.description: Get full message details by ID

parameters.name: message_ids
parameters.description: Array of message IDs to label

parameters.name: label_ids
parameters.description: Array of label IDs to add (e.g., ['IMPORTANT', 'STARRED'])

parameters.name: message_ids
parameters.description: Array of message IDs to delete

endpoints.description: Fetch sent emails with full content (subject, body, recipients). Use this to see what emails you have sent.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of sent emails to fetch (default: 10)

parameters.name: include_body
parameters.description: Whether to include full email body (default: true)

endpoints.description: Get a specific sent email by message ID with full content (subject, body, recipients)

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: Gmail message ID of the sent email

endpoints.description: Get the most recently sent email with full content. Quick way to check what was just sent.
Download all attachments from an email. Returns file paths for image/document agents to analyze.

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: Gmail message ID to download attachments from

endpoints.description: Search for emails that have attachments

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of emails to return (default: 10)

endpoints.description: Compose and send a professionally formatted HTML email using templates. Supports multiple templates (basic, professional, newsletter) and automatic formatting with attachments.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Main email content (will be formatted according to template)

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Template style: basic, professional, newsletter (default: basic)

parameters.name: header_text
parameters.description: Optional header text for the email

parameters.name: footer_text
parameters.description: Optional footer text for the email

parameters.name: attachment_file_ids
parameters.description: Array of file IDs to attach

parameters.name: attachment_paths
parameters.description: Array of file paths to attach

endpoints.description: Format email content with various styles (markdown to HTML, bullet points, numbered lists). Returns formatted HTML for use in send_email.

parameters.name: format_type
parameters.description: Format type: markdown, bullet_points, numbered_list (default: markdown)

endpoints.description: List available email templates and their descriptions

capabilities.name: Send Email With Attachments
capabilities.description: Capability to send email with attachments
examples: Help me send email with attachments

capabilities.name: Fetch Message By Id
capabilities.description: Capability to fetch message by id
examples: Help me fetch message by id

capabilities.name: Get Sent Email Content
capabilities.description: Capability to get sent email content
examples: Help me get sent email content

capabilities.name: Get Last Sent Email
capabilities.description: Capability to get last sent email
examples: Help me get last sent email

capabilities.name: Search Emails With Attachments
capabilities.description: Capability to search emails with attachments
examples: Help me search emails with attachments

capabilities.name: Attach Files To Email
capabilities.description: Capability to attach files to email
examples: Help me attach files to email

capabilities.name: Send Files Via Email
capabilities.description: Capability to send files via email
examples: Help me send files via email

capabilities.name: See What Was Sent
capabilities.description: Capability to see what was sent
examples: Help me see what was sent
